Haplotype ViewÔÉÅ

Another view for the result of the genotype query is the Haplotype View. This allows us to know whether our haplotypes make sense.


You should also see major grouping of alleles which contributes to the haplotype.


In this hands-on, you should see 3 major haplotype groups.


Knowledge Check: How many varieties belong to each major haplotype group?
